setting.title: Buzzard's Bay, Massachusetts
setting.p: Brother Blood is mediating when Mother Mayhem lets him know the Brotherhood of Evil are on their way to take him down. He decides to hold a sermon.

setting.title: Zandia
setting.p: Brotherhood of Evil has just finished destroying Brother Blood's Church and killing his followers. However, without noticing, one of his followers sneaked onto the plane. The supporter makes them crash.

setting.title: Titans' Tower
setting.p: Robin is working out, angry at himself. WOnder Girl is worried for him, but Robin doesn't listen and continues to push himself to ridiculous lengths. While she's worried about Robin and Koriand'r, she thinks back to the meeting between Terry and his ex-wife and daughter.

setting.title: Raven's Room
setting.p: Kid Flash is looking for advice about what to do concerning the Titans and his school, but he goes to Raven to ask questions about their relationship. Raven insists that nothing can occur between them.

setting.title: An Island in Mid-Atlantic
setting.p: The members of Brotherhood of Evil take solace in this island after the crash of their plane due to Warp teleporting them.

setting.title: Titans' Tower
setting.p: Wonder Girl finds Koriand'r on the roof sulking. She advises Koriand'r that she shouldn't let Robin affect her so much and makes her exit to go talk to Terry.

setting.title: Somewhere in the Atlantic Ocean
setting.p: Warp has teleported them again with America being the end goal. He gets tired easily teleporting multiple people and asks for a rest. Brother Blood's missionaries have found them, but Phobia uses her powers on them.

setting.title: New York City
setting.p: An unknown girl makes her way to the Titans' Tower.

setting.title: Titans' Tower
setting.p: Seeing that Koriand'r is upset because of Robin, Speedy tries to make his move on her. Robin enters at that moment and calls him out on it. Koriand'r thinks it was uncalled for, but Robin isn't thinking straight. He's not listening to her thoughts and mentions that he's going to see Adrian Chase. Koriand'r goes with him reluctantly.

setting.title: Buzzard's Bay, Massachusetts
setting.p: Sister Bethany reveals that she has a meeting with the Titans and Adrian Chase; Brother Blood praises her.

setting.title: Somewhere in the Atlantic Ocean
setting.p: The missionaries are dead. The Brotherhood of Evil uses their fliers to get to their desired destination.

setting.title: Titans' Tower
setting.p: Beast Boy and Terra are arguing about trust when they walk in on Speedy eating a sandwich. He's questioning her about the inconsistencies of her story. Terra storms out with Beast Boy running after her. Victor doesn't see the point of Beast Boy obsessing over reforming Terra and leaves to go work in the machine shop. In another room is Kid Flash. He senses the emergency signal and goes outside to see what the problem is. Outside he runs into Frances Kane; her powers have return, and she wants the Titans to help her. Victor leaves the island.

setting.title: Manhattan
setting.p: Koriand'r and Robin have arrived at Adrian Chase's house. She's playing with his childen, but Robin chastens her actions. Chase is late. He arrives shortly after, and they head to Bethany Snow's studio together.

setting.title: Titans' Tower
setting.p: Fran demostrates her powers, and Kid Flash asks her to become a titan. She reveals she wants nothing to do with her powers and only came to get help to get them removed.

setting.title: Kitchen
setting.p: Speedy is in the kitchen making tomato soup when the Brotherhood of Evil appear out of thin air. Feeling their presense, Kid Flash and Raven go inside instructing Fran to stay outside. The goal is kidnapping Raven; Warp is able to get her body, but Raven releases her soul at the trap. Houngan and Plasmus fight Kid Flash while Phobia uses her powers on Raven to make her see her worst fear, Trigon. Speedy is useless in the fight. Fran runs in right on time to Raven trying to kill Kid Flash who is Trigon in her mind. Worried she might stop their plan, Plasmus attacks her. However a turn of events occurs; Plasmus is taken down by an arrow and Fran takes down Phobia, freeing Raven. Now freed, Kid Flash is now afraid of the person Raven is. In anger, he shouts for her to leave.
